Package src

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
src.GameController
public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
The Model part of the MVC pattern. In charge of backend game mechanics once the game has started.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    GameController​(int width, int height, src.CoyDebug debug)
    The Model part of the MVC pattern.

      height - of the screen in int
      debug - the debug instance created by main

      public boolean anyBricksInPlay()
      Used to end the game.
      Returns:
      if any bricks are visible on the screen

      Parameters:

      y - int coordinate of the brick
      health - int health of the brick
      Returns:

      Parameters:
